=============p2


CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE
  `prod-gold-bi-reporting.drivers.acq_new_mailables_weekly_cohort1_rev_pt1`
CLUSTER BY
  mailable_event_dt,
  global_member_token AS
WITH
  activity_drv AS (
  SELECT
    ref.event_dt AS mailable_event_dt,
    ref.partner_name,
    ref.partner_type,
    ref.placement,
    ref.media_channel,
    ref.tracking_token,
    drv.global_member_token,
    ref.optin_flag,
    ref.occrn_flag,
    ref.eligibility_sub_cd,
    ref.event_status,
    ref.event_end_dt,
    ref.acq_tracking_type,
    ref.affiliate_networks,
    ref.affiliate_subid,
    ref.pch_age_range,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) = 0 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_0day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 1 AND 7 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_1and7day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 8 AND 14 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_8and14day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 8 AND 30 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_8and30day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 15 AND 21 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_15and21day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 22 AND 28 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_22and28day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 29 AND 60 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_29and60day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_61and90day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt_91and120day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 121 AND 150 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.max_margin_pchapp_mobileandroid_all_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END

    `uat-gold-core.it_adhoc_rpt_analysis.acq_new_mailables_drv_weekly` ref
  ON
    (drv.activity_dt BETWEEN ref.event_dt  AND ref.event_end_dt AND drv.global_member_token = ref.global_member_token) )

sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_29and60day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_29and60day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_61and90day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_61and90day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_91and120day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_91and120day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_121and150day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_121and150day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_151and180day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_151and180day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_181and240day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_181and240day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_241and300day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_241and300day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_301and360day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_301and360day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt,
sum(gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_0day)  gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_0day,
sum(gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_1and7day)  gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_1and7day
from activity_drv GROUP BY
  mailable_event_dt,
  partner_name,
  partner_type,
  placement,
  media_channel,
  tracking_token,
  global_member_token,
  optin_flag,
  occrn_flag,
  eligibility_sub_cd,
  event_status,
  event_end_dt,
  acq_tracking_type,
  affiliate_networks,
  affiliate_subid,
  pch_age_range;

===p3

   
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE
  `prod-gold-bi-reporting.drivers.acq_new_mailables_weekly_cohort1_rev_pt3`
CLUSTER BY
  mailable_event_dt,
  global_member_token AS
WITH
  activity_drv AS (
  SELECT
    ref.event_dt AS mailable_event_dt,
    ref.partner_name,
    ref.partner_type,
    ref.placement,
    ref.media_channel,
    ref.tracking_token,
    drv.global_member_token,
    ref.optin_flag,
    ref.occrn_flag,
    ref.eligibility_sub_cd,
    ref.event_status,
    ref.event_end_dt,
    ref.acq_tracking_type,
    ref.affiliate_networks,
    ref.affiliate_subid,
    ref.pch_age_range,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 8 AND 14 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobiledisplay_payperactionnonprog_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_8and14day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 8 AND 30 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobiledisplay_payperactionnonprog_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_8and30day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 15 AND 21 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobiledisplay_payperactionnonprog_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_15and21day,
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_DIFF(drv.activity_dt, ref.event_dt, DAY) BETWEEN 22 AND 28 THEN drv.acq_new_mailables.gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobiledisplay_payperactionnonprog_lst_1day_amt
    ELSE
    0
  END
    gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_payperaction_nonprog_total_amt_22and28day,
    CASE

    `uat-gold-core.it_adhoc_rpt_analysis.acq_new_mailables_drv_weekly` ref
  ON
    (drv.activity_dt BETWEEN ref.event_dt
      AND ref.event_end_dt
      AND drv.global_member_token = ref.global_member_token) )

sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_22and28day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_22and28day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_29and60day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_29and60day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_61and90day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_61and90day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_91and120day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_91and120day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_121and150day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_121and150day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_151and180day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_151and180day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_181and240day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_181and240day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_241and300day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_241and300day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_301and360day)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_301and360day,
sum(gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt)  gam_margin_pchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt,
sum(gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_0day)  gam_margin_searchfrchs_nonmobile_display_cpm_prog_total_amt_0day
 from activity_drv
 GROUP BY
  mailable_event_dt,
  partner_name,
  partner_type,
  placement,
  media_channel,
  tracking_token,
  global_member_token,
  optin_flag,
  occrn_flag,
  eligibility_sub_cd,
  event_status,
  event_end_dt,
  acq_tracking_type,
  affiliate_networks,
  affiliate_subid,
  pch_age_range;

join `prod-gold-bi-reporting.drivers.acq_new_mailables_weekly_cohort1_rev_pt3` p2
on 
p1.mailable_event_dt=	p2.mailable_event_dt	and
p1.partner_name=	p2.partner_name	and
p1.partner_type=	p2.partner_type	and
p1.placement=	p2.placement	and
p1.media_channel=	p2.media_channel	and
p1.tracking_token=	p2.tracking_token	and
p1.global_member_token=	p2.global_member_token	and
p1.optin_flag=	p2.optin_flag	and
p1.occrn_flag=	p2.occrn_flag	and
p1.eligibility_sub_cd=	p2.eligibility_sub_cd	and
p1.event_status=	p2.event_status	and
p1.event_end_dt=	p2.event_end_dt	and
p1.acq_tracking_type=	p2.acq_tracking_type	and
p1.affiliate_networks=	p2.affiliate_networks	and
p1.affiliate_subid=	p2.affiliate_subid	and
p1.pch_age_range=	p2.pch_age_range	


---Final---

 CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE
  `prod-gold-bi-reporting.drivers.acq_new_mailables_weekly_cohort1_rev`
CLUSTER BY
  mailable_event_dt,
  global_member_token AS
 SELECT
  mailable_event_dt,
  partner_name,
  partner_type,
  placement,

  event_status,
